_gram:

_meanings:
{@--2@} To draw 
anything out of another (with two
<ab>acc.</ab>); {#prARAnduhannivAtmAnaM SokaM#} 
{#cittamavAruDat#} <ls>Bk. 6. 9.</ls>

{@--3@} To drain a thing
of its contents, to make profit out

{#divaM#} <ls>R. 1. 26.</ls>
